node.title: A Case Study in Faith
node.description: In this presentation, Dr. Shin will share a remarkable case study of a patient with acute myeloid leukemia and her family's journey as they struggle with issues of faith in the face of a terminal illness. In the context of this patient's story, Dr. Shin will explore the challenges of sharing one's faith in the hospital setting, the role of faith when medicine offers no hope, and what it truly means to be a co-worker with Christ.
